Al di là del fatto che sono uno sportivo da sempre, devo ammettere che ho una passione sfegatata per le scarpe da ginnastica. Ne compro in continuazione, non riesco a smettere. Ne ho circa 30 paia dei miei marchi prediletti, che non son pochi. Naturalmente, Under Armour figura nella lista ed anche fra le prime posizioni per preferenza. Non sono fra le scarpe più "tecniche" ma sono sicuramente fra le più belle e confortevoli che si possano trovare sul mercato.Queste UA Charged Assert 10 sono bellissime e ben studiate. La calzata è ottima, la scarpa fascia bene e la suola, secondo me, ha la giusta consistenza per supportare una buona corsa offrendo ammortizzazione e rimbalzo ma senza cedere sotto il peso del passo. Per intenderci, la suola è in espanso, non tipo memory: non è di quelle che danno la sensazione di camminare sulle uova sode tipo Skechers o come svariate Nike. Quelle ultra-morbide, stile pantofola, van bene per pochi passi, un volo in aereo magari ma non si può andarci a correre o camminarci sopra per turismo un'intera giornata, non senza poi avere male ai piedi. Per correre ci vuole una suola come quella di queste Under Armour: non rigida ma reattiva e sostenuta e, la tomaia, non può essere un calzino. Anche quella deve offrire un po' di struttura su tutti i lati. Questa è una scarpa studiata da corsa e presenta i giusti contenuti tecnici.Se poi non è la prestazione sportiva ad interessarvi e state valutando questa scarpa come sneaker da jeans, beh, secondo me siete comunque nel posto giusto perché a livello estetico, queste scarpe, non hanno nulla da invidiare ad Adidas, Puma, Nike e compagnia bella.Per quanto riguarda i numeri, posso dirvi che io ho generalmente un 42 e, da sempre, su Under Armour acquisto il 42,5 con successo.Ciao!

these trainers are so comfortable, I'm a 9.5 size and they are true to size, great style and very lightweight matterial , only just started wearing them so can't rate durability yet but the build quality for price and I got a bargain at just under £50 I have sciatica in my left leg and foot and plantar fasciitis in my right side heel and I thought I'd try this brand as I like there clothing and I'm glad I did as the heels on these trainers are alot softer than my normal Karimoor trainers so it's helping me with walking as I have differeculty. anyhow they are very comfortable and I'm sure il get 2 seasons out of them.

One thing I noted about this handgrip strengthening machine I would say is a completely amazing gadget so little thing to have that can actually strengthen your forearms and also your wrist movement as well and I found out that the reason being is because well you can actually change the settings of weight and it's very very accurate I would say I personally feel like he could do a little work with the grip because it does feel a bit tight and it's hard to grip on for too long but however the fact that it's got the clicking thing at the bottom as well to help you actually time it is fantastic and get yourself one of these very useful specially if you have one in each hand because then you're training both hands equally and that's why it's important to have a balanced hand section. overall things are fantastic product and I definitely recommend it for the price.
Super pratique

È un attrezzo più da tempo libero che da palestra. Un ottimo esercizio che, a regolazione leggera, funge da antistress. Facile da regolare, il materiale delle rotelline non è il massimo, plastichetta fragile.. a meno che non cada o non subisca urti, non dovrebbero esserci problemi. La tensione della molla arriva a kg importanti perciò, chi lo desidera, può cimentarsi in un esercizio più impegnativo. Può essere utile per una sana riabilitazione e il recupero di mobilità di chi ha intorpidimento delle mani. Lo scatto del conta-strette non è silenzioso, non usatelo in biblioteca ;)

Es un termo de calidad que mantiene perfectamente la temperatura de líquidos fríos y calientes, con capacidad para 500 ml. Su pintura, color y acabados son muy bonitos y aguantadores. Es fácil de manejar incluso con una mano y cabe en cualquier espacio de portavasos en un coche. La tapa tiene un seguro para bloquear su apertura. Una vez abierta la tapa, por dentro hay un boton que puedes recorrer para definir la cantidad de líquidos que saldrá.

Flip top, perfect size, good flow, handle and really good quality. It's a Stanley so expect the best! The size is a little skinnier than the description says, it's about 2.75" round which is easier to hold for small hands. I cannot find a silicone boot to fit so will just be careful and try not to drop. I don't see why this is marketed to kids, it works great for an adult.

I ordered 3 of these for my kids for school. All 3 broke within 2 months. The cap on top breaks very easily and does not stand up to use by kids. For an adult it would be fine as long as you aren't clumsy and never drop it. I did reach out to Stanley and they would not replace them.

These are probably the best food containers we have. They keep food warmer than others. Food is still a good temperature by the time my child eats lunch at school. It holds more than others too, but fits perfectly in a lunch bag. We love the convenience of the included spork with holder. We have been using this for months and have never had a leak, even when it is turned on its side and full of soup. We also love that it’s easy to clean in the dishwasher. Worth paying a little more for the quality!
Leak proof, holds temperature well, and is a nice size for the hot part of my traveling meal.
My hot lunch was just almost as hot when I ate it while on jury duty, as when I packed it 5 hours earlier!!

THIS DOES NOT LEAK!!!I can’t even tell you how many little lunch box soup thermos’ I have bought because my daughter wants to have ramen at school. And they all leaked! So I finally bought the coveted Stanley brand, and in this instance at least: it’s worth the hype. No leaks AND I can put the whole thing in the dishwasher! Yesssss!!!

The item states it should stay warm for 7 hours. I packed my sons lunch in it two time (following all the directions to prepare the thermos to hold the heat) and when his daycare teacher opens it 3 hours later it is not even lukewarm. So I tested it at home, and I tried it 2 hours later and it was barely even warm. I redid the process and tried it 3 hours later and as they stated it was not even remotely warm. This is unsafe because the food gets into the temperature range where bacteria can grow rapidly. My son is 13 months old (1year) and a food-born Illness could be extremely dangerous. Amazon won’t offer support with the return and Stanley makes it impossible to contact them for a return. DONT ORDER!

Ayakkabının kendi kutusu toz içindeydi. Tamam sorun değil dedim. İçini açınca ise… Ayakkabı ya mağazadan teşhir ürünü yada iade ürün. Sorun şu ki, ayakkabılar kutuya gelişi güzel konmuş, bağcıklar açıkta, içindeki dolgu kağıtlar yırtık ve uzunca bir saç teli… ilk defa yaşadığım bu sorun gerçekten hayal kırıklığı yarattı. İADE!

Son un poco más estrechas por la parte de los dedos respecto al modelo anterior (ver imagen).No obstante, andando unos kilómetros dan de sí y se tornan más cómodas y ajustadas. Las utilizo para caminar unos 4-5km diarios y para el día a día y van geniales.PROS🟢Muy cómodas. Sujetan muy bien el pie.🟢Buena adherencia de la suela en todo tipo de terrenos.🟢La suela parece bastante duradera debido al refuerzo que lleva.🟢 Son ligeras o al menos es la sensación que transmiten.🟢Son altamente transpirables, ideales para climas cálidos. Sin embargo, en invierno o temperaturas muy bajas, dejan sentir el fríoCONTRAS🔴No lleva refuerzo en la puntera como el modelo anterior (ver imagen). Espero que no se acaben perforando.🔴Uno de los ojales venía despegado, pero lo solucioné fácilmente apretándolo con unos alicates, sin mayores inconvenientes.🔴Para mi gusto, los cordones son excesivamente largos.CONCLUSIÓN⚫Las recomiendo sin dudarlo para el uso diario o para caminar, especialmente si las consigues por menos de 40€. Con el modelo anterior recorrí muchos kilómetros, y su durabilidad fue excelente. Sin embargo, para correr, elegiría un modelo con mejor amortiguación.❗Hay que tener cuidado con las tallas. En estas un 42 son 26'5cm pero en cambio en Reebok un 42 son 27cm.Espero que te haya sido útil mi opinión 👍.

I had a knee injury which left my knees super sensitive and I couldn’t wear most of my shoes because they were too hard on my foot except for Under Armour it was the only shoes that enabled me from going to my exams without pain or discomfort.Very much recommend

Kaliteli hafif ve esnek nir urün. Normalde 42,5 giyiyorum 44 siparis ettim boy olarak tam oldu. Fakat ayağınız taraklıysa yanlar çok hafif sıkı oluyor. Fakat esneme payıda var. Bought this for when I occasionally go away camping for 3 days, I typically fill it with ice packs the morning that I leave. I've found that on hotter days, as long as you only open it a couple of times throughout the day, typically it will take about 2 days before the last icepack has melted.I'm very happy overall, the handles make it easy to carry, the drainage plug helps when cleaning. Its a great overall product.

Die Box ist super verarbeitet, schließt gut, hält lange kalt und bietet zusätzliche Ablagefläche bei unserem Picknick. Ich definiere "lange kalt": die restlichen Lebensmittel und Getränk, von dem was wir für unsere Tagestour um ca. 5:00 eingepackt haben, waren Dank 2 Kühlakkus um ca. 23:00 kälter als noch vor dem Einpacken... Die Box ist zu unserem treuen Begleiter geworden.

I've used this a number of times with ice and you'll be lucky to get a day before all the ice is melted. Thankfully it has a drain so you can tip all the melted ice out.I put two large bags of ice in over the weekend along with some already frozen Calippos and the Calippos had melted by the time I got home, about six hours max.
Esperaba mantuviera mejor el frío.

Fantastic.I love the colour (purple and orange). Way better than the brand's other models.

Umder armour 20 senedir bildiğim marka.Daha öncede ayakkabı,çanta, tişört gibi farklı ürünlerde uyardım, bu markanın ürünleri Türkiyede Son zamanlarda çok sorunlu, bir kaç üründen Fake diye huylandım. Bu ayakkıbıyıda kızım için istedim fakat tabandaki ağır kimyasal kokusu,burun kısmındaki sarı tutkal artıkları ve numara ölçüsünün tutarsızlığı hatta malzemenin kalitesi beni huylandırdı. Aynı marka aynı model Usa'dan aldığım 39eu numara bu ayakkabının 37eu ile boyu aynı. Bu markada numarada tutarsızlık olmaz ama bunda var. İade ettim. Fake olmasa bile 3-5. Sınıf bir yerde en düşük kalitede ürttirilmiş.Resim eklemeyi bulamadım bulursam resim ekleyeceğim.

I’ve had these for a year & alternate between these & a pair of Nikes & they’re still in great shape. I tried just about every brand in my hunt for walking/light jogging sneakers, and for me, these were by far the most comfortable, even over $160 New Balances & expensive Diadora & ASICS…Adidas Ultraboost etc. Every foot is different - for me, different shoes press against the inner foot bone uncomfortably, and there’s no issue with that here. The sole is thick & cushiony which I find supportive, and my feet don’t feel overly compressed. There is a nice little bounce which each step. True to size. I’d recommend.

Super Schuhe, sehr bequem und chic..
Super Passform, bequem und leicht!
These trainers are good value and a good classic look, as well as being a good fit and comfy.

Die Under Armour Herren UA Charged Speed Swift Laufschuhe sind einfach fantastisch! Ich nutze sie hauptsächlich als Sportschuhe im Studio und ab und zu auf dem Laufband, und sie bieten genau die Unterstützung, die ich brauche. Besonders bei meiner Neigung zur Supination unterstützen sie mich hervorragend, ohne dass der Komfort darunter leidet. Die Schuhe sind unglaublich weich und bequem, was sie zu einem idealen Begleiter für jede Trainingseinheit macht.Die Passform ist ebenfalls perfekt – Größe 44 passt genau, wie man es erwarten würde, wenn man sonst auch 44 trägt. Die Schuhe sitzen gut am Fuß, bieten den nötigen Halt und verhindern, dass ich während des Trainings irgendwelche Beschwerden habe.Insgesamt bin ich mehr als zufrieden und kann die UA Charged Speed Swift jedem empfehlen, der nach einem bequemen und unterstützenden Sportschuh sucht, der auch bei Supination bestens funktioniert. Ein echtes Highlight in meiner Sportschuh-Sammlung!

Ayakkabı gayet güzel ve rahat ama kesinlikle büyük numara alın. Normalde 41 giyiyorum 42 aldım 42,5da alınabilirmiş
Ayakkabı çok güzelmiş fakat kalıbı dar ben 42,5 giyiyorum ama 43 aldım yine de hafif sıkıyor. Çok şık tavsiye ederim i.
Ürün çok iyi ama alırken 1,5 numara büyük alın, 45 numara ayağım ama 46 numara küçük geldi. Amazon hemen iade aldı parayı da hemen yatırdı, amazona 5 yıldız.

Ayakkabıyı belli bir süre giydikten sonra ıslak banyo terliği gibi gıcır gıcır rahatsız edici bir ses çıkartıyor.Kullanıcı hatası deyip geçecekleri için iade etmedim.(Lacivert ve siyah iki renk almıştım,ikisinden de aynı gıcırtı sesi geliyor.)Sol ön kısımda da kalıp hatası var,baş parmağı rahatsız ediyor.Açılır diye iade etmedim,ama maalesef açılmadı.

Ürün güzel, sadece diğer markalara göre ayakkabıları biraz dar ve küçük kalıplı olması nedeniyle, 1.5 veya 2 numara büyük alınması tavsiye edilir. ben şahsen ayakkabı 42 numara giyiyorum, bu modelden 44 numara aldım.
Uruny güzel fakat kalıp inanılmaz küçük 1 numara büyük almama rağmen aldığım kişiye küçük geldi numara degisimi yapmak istiyorum ne yapmalıyım yoksa iade
Normalde 42 numara giyiyorum ama bir numara büyük sipariş ettim ,yani 43 sipariş ettim,tam oldu. Aklınızda olsun,bir numara büyük sipariş edin. Parasına göre güzel ayakkabı , tavsiye ederim

I got these trainers for my teenage son and he is absolutely loving them and find them super comfortable. The laces are easy-to-tie, the shoes are lightweight and also well-padded for extra comfort. The design is simple but stylish. Under Armour products are always made to a very high quality and they are durable. I highly recommend this product. My son is happy with them.
